title: Nez Perce National Historical Park: Suggested Reading
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Education     Suggested Reading              Suggested Reading      There are hundreds of books and articles on the Nez Perce people, their history, and culture. The Nez Perce National Historic Trail offers a comprehensive, annotated bibliography of Nez Perce history and, in particular, the Nez Perce War. We have some books available for sale through the web and provided a link to the virtual book store. The park has a research center with a non-lending library for those who would like to do indepth research on the Nez Perce.
